body: I just don't understand why he needed to pretend to be her tutor. Just have them tell their daughter that they are brother and sister on her 16th birthday and that its time for her to join the family pastime.
One line is all it takes to give a story a 180° spin xD ><
This is far above Game Of Thrones level incest.
Holy crap, there's like four kinds of incest with these three people and it all came out in two sentences.
